2000920.name: CONNIPTION: Paranoia
2000920.description:
A young demon hunter tracks down a missing person and a violent demonic cult to a secluded coastal ghost town with a dark past, surrounded by cliffs, mountains, and dense forests, hunted by those lurking in the mist.

In this melee-focused action survival horror experience, master visceral melee combat, gather resources, craft utilities, explore the dark foggy town and its surroundings, and face the consequences of its past in a desperate struggle for survival.
2000920.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
